primary.influence_conversion: Spend any amount of influence to gain 1 command token for every 3 influence spent.

secondary.influence_conversion: Spend any amount of influence to gain 1 command token for every 3 influence spent.

primary.peace_treaty: Choose 1 system other than Mecatol Rex that contains a planet you control; each other player places a command token from reinforcements in that system.
primary.ready_planets: Ready up to two exhausted planets you control.

secondary.ready_planets: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to ready up to 2 exhausted planets you control.

primary.speaker_token: Choose a player other than the speaker. That player gains the speaker token.
primary.agenda_manipulation: Look at the top 2 cards of the agenda deck. Place each card on the top or bottom of the deck in any order.

secondary.draw_action_cards: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to draw 2 action cards.

primary.place_structure: Either place 1 structure on a planet you control, or use the PRODUCTION ability of 1 of your space docks.
primary.bonus_structure: Place 1 structure on a planet you control.

secondary.place_structure: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 1 structure on a planet you control.

primary.negotiation: Choose any number of other players. Those players use the secondary ability of this strategy card without spending a command token.

secondary.replenish: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to replenish commodities.

primary.free_tactical_action: Perform a tactical action in any system without placing a command token, even if already activated.
primary.redistribution: You may redistribute your command tokens before and after this action.

secondary.home_production: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to use the PRODUCTION abilities of the units in your home system.

secondary.paid_research: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool and 4 resources to research 1 technology.

primary.score_public: Immediately score 1 public objective if you fulfill its requirements.
primary.mecatol_bonus: Gain 1 victory point if you control Mecatol Rex; otherwise, draw 1 secret objective.

secondary.draw_secret: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to draw 1 secret objective.
